Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive

Class SelectedItemState

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive.InteractiveState
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive.SelectedItemState
public class SelectedItemState extends InteractiveState
Class implementing actions on the currently selected items.

  • Field Summary

    • get_instance

      public static SelectedItemState get_instance(Set<Item> p_item_list, InteractiveState p_parent_state, BoardHandling p_board_handling, ActivityReplayFile p_activityReplayFile)
      Creates a new SelectedItemState with with the items in p_item_list selected. Returns null, if p_item_list is empty.

    • autoroute

      public InteractiveState autoroute(Stoppable p_stoppable_thread)
      Autoroutes the selected items. If p_stoppable_thread != null, the algorithm can be requestet to terminate.

    • fanout

      public InteractiveState fanout(Stoppable p_stoppable_thread)
      Fanouts the pins contained in the selected items. If p_stoppable_thread != null, the algorithm can be requestet to terminate.

    • pull_tight

      public InteractiveState pull_tight(Stoppable p_stoppable_thread)
      Optimizes the selected items. If p_stoppable_thread != null, the algorithm can be requestet to terminate.

    • assign_clearance_class

      public InteractiveState assign_clearance_class(int p_cl_class_index)
      Assigns the input clearance class to the selected items.

    • toggle_select

      public InteractiveState toggle_select(FloatPoint p_point)
      Picks item at p_point. Removes it from the selected_items list, if it is already in there, otherwise adds it to the list. Returns true (to change to the return_state) if nothing was picked.

    • toggle_clearance_violations

      public void toggle_clearance_violations()
      Shows or hides the clearance violations of the selected items..

    • filter

      public InteractiveState filter()
      Removes items not selected by the current interactive filter from the selected item list.

      Prints information about the selected item into a graphical text window.
